text: Norman John Warren (25 June 1942 â€“ 11 March 2021) was an English movie director. He was best known for directing 1970s horror movies such as Satan's Slave (1976), Prey (1977) and Terror (1978). Warren was also known for sex comedies such as Outer Touch. He was born in London. Warren died on 11 March 2021, aged 78.RIP Norman J. Warren ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Movie directors from London
title: Norman J. Warren
